question:
What do you do with bad smelling food?

Choices:
A: throw it in an outside trash can so it does not stink up the house.
B: put the food into the garbage disposal and turn on the disposal.
steps: Bad smelling food can create an unpleasant odor in your home.
If you put the food into the garbage disposal, the smell can still linger from the garbage disposal, especially if it is not thoroughly cleaned afterwards.
The most effective way to prevent bad smells from affecting the house is to remove the source of the odor completely by throwing the bad smelling food out of the house.
By throwing the bad smelling food in an outside trash can, you are ensuring that the odor is removed from the indoor environment.
Therefore, the best action to take with bad smelling food is to throw it in an outside trash can so it does not stink up the house.
